name: MaFl_Mikyel
oralText: Welcome to the Flarine Quest Office! Looking for work? I may have a job for you...
introText: My apologies, there are no quests available for an adventurer of your talent and skill at this time.

links.title: Who are you?
texts: My name is Mikyel and I am the manager of Flarine Quest Office. When our citizens post a hunting order or another task, it is my job to find the right candidate for the job. Check back in from time to time to see if I have anything available!
